boardgame.name: Click Clack Lumberjack
Gemblo Woodman
Toc Toc Woodman
Tok Tok Woodman
Wióry Lecą
Woodman
Семь гномов и зачарованный лес
伐木達人
톡톡우드맨
boardgame.description: There are two very different versions of Toc Toc Woodman, and also a third edition named Click Clack Lumberjack which makes minor additions to the second edition of Toc Toc Woodman. In each version, the object of the game revolves around using a plastic axe to tap a tree made out of individual flat segments without causing any segments to fall out of the tree._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Tok Tok Woodman First edition:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A very simple dexterity game with 12 large wooden discs, a wooden axe, and a die. The discs are stacked as a tower. A player turn consists of rolling the die and then hitting the tower with the axe. For example, if you roll a five, you have to hit the fifth disc five times with the axe. The player causing the tower to fall loses._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Toc Toc Woodman Second edition: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A dexterity game where nine plastic tree segments are stacked up. Each tree segment has four bark sections around it. On their turn, a player gets two taps with the axe to try and knock off pieces of bark from the tree segments for one point a piece. But be careful, if a tree segment comes down it's minus 5 points! A quick unique dexterity game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Click Clack Lumberjack First edition:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Very similar to Toc Toc Woodman Second edition, but adds some optional grub stickers which you may apply to bark pieces in order to add various rules for the grub. Also comes in smaller, more portable packaging and at a lower price point._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: New! A family Party Game: Toc Toc Woodman! “ Don’t Rush~ ‘Toc! Toc!’ knock off all the BARK pieces with an AX… be careful~ don’t let the TREE fall!” Challenge your friend with the basic or the extreme versions of playing Toc Toc Woodman. The goal of the game is to take off as many bark pieces from the trunks as possible!!!” BASIC RULE - Receive a penalty point if you take down any of the trunk pieces but keep playing the game until there isn’t any bark pieces left on the tree trunk. EXTREME RULE – Objective is to take off the tree barks but the game comes to an end when a trunk falls off the foundation. Players Required: 2 to 7 players Components: 9*Tree Trunk pieces, 36*bark pieces, 1*Foundation, 1*Ax, 1*Instruction page Ax, Trunk Pieces, Foundation, Bark pieces The Gaming~ 1. Place the bark pieces onto the trunks and piled them according to Picture A and B. (Basic Rule – novice) 1. From the first player to the last, take turns in clockwise circle and hit the tree twice each. 2. Earn Points by chopping the bark pieces off of the tree. Each bark piece is worth one point. 3. If a player chops a trunk piece from the tree, the player is given minus five points. (penalty of negative five points) 4. In the first version of the basic rule: winners are declared when they meet the following criteria. ***According the number of players, if a player earns following points, he is declared the winner and can be excused from playing any further. 2 players – person with 16 points 3 players – person with 16 points 4 players – person with 16 points 5 players – person with 16 points 6 players – person with 16 points 7 players – person with 16 points 5. Game continues to be played till no bark pieces are left on the tree trunks and the winner can be declared by calculating the bark pieces as one point and the Trunk piece as minus 5 points. 6. When the points are matched between players, the person who started the game later is declared the winner. Extreme Rule (advanced level) *** Same basic rule applies but if the player chops the trunk piece off, he is automatically in the last place and is eliminated from the game, so it is important to chop with precision. In the second version of the basic rule: winners are declared when they meet the following criteria. According the number of players, if a player cannot meet the cutline points, he is the loser. The last player is declared by playing till the points are earned. 2 players – at least 10 points 3 players – at least 6 points 4 players – at least 5 points 5 players – at least 4 points 6 players – at least 4 points 7 players – at least 3 points Other ways to enjoy the game Change the rules to allow children to chop 3 times versus adults who can only chop twice. If a sort of penalty is given to the loser or a reward given to the winner, then there will be more at risk to enjoy this family oriented game.

New! A family Party Game: Toc Toc Woodman!
“ Don’t Rush~ ‘Toc! Toc!’ knock off all the bark pieces with an AX… Challenge your friend with the basic or the extreme versions of playing Toc Toc Woodman. be careful~ don’t let the tree fall!” The goal of the game is to take off as many bark pieces from the trunks as possible!!!”
BASIC RULE - Receive a penalty point if you take down any of the trunk pieces but keep playing the game until there isn’t any bark pieces left on the tree trunk. EXTREME RULE – Objective is to take off the tree barks but the game comes to an end when a trunk falls off the foundation. Players Required: 2 to 7 players Components: 9*Tree Trunk pieces, 36*bark pieces, 1*Foundation, 1*Ax, 1*Instruction page Ax, Trunk Pieces, Foundation, Bark pieces The Gaming~ 1. Place the bark pieces onto the trunks and piled them according to Picture A and B. (Basic Rule – novice) 1. From the first player to the last, take turns in clockwise circle and hit the tree twice each. 2. Earn Points by chopping the bark pieces off of the tree. Each bark piece is worth one point. 3. If a player chops a trunk piece from the tree, the player is given minus five points. (penalty of negative five points) 4. Game continues to be played till no bark pieces are left on the tree trunks and the winner can be declared by calculating the bark pieces as one point and the Trunk piece as minus 5 points. 6. When the points are matched between players, the person who started the game later is declared the winner. Extreme Rule (advanced level) *** Same basic rule applies but if the player chops the trunk piece off, he is automatically in the last place and is eliminated from the game, so it is important to chop with precision. In the second version of the basic rule: winners are declared when they meet the following criteria. According the number of players, if a player cannot meet the cutline points, he is the loser. The last player is declared by playing till the points are earned. 2 players – at least 10 points 3 players – at least 6 points 4 players – at least 5 points 5 players – at least 4 points 6 players – at least 4 points 7 players – at least 3 points Other ways to enjoy the game Change the rules to allow children to chop 3 times versus adults who can only chop twice. If a sort of penalty is given to the loser or a reward given to the winner, then there will be more at risk to enjoy this family oriented game.

Mayday Games (MYY4298) Tok Tok is a fun, fast-paced game of dexterity that many have described as a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Reverse Jenga_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. With over 10,000 copies sold in Korea, this hit game is now taking the US by storm! Play from 2-7 players as you become a woodman (or woman) trying to take down some bark (+1 point each) without knocking off the center pieces (-5 points each). You get 2 chops with the axe each turn and the game continues until all the bark is gone!

Mayday Games (MYY4298) Tok Tok is a fun, fast-paced game of dexterity that many have described as a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Reverse Jenga_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. With over 10,000 copies sold in Korea, this hit game is now taking the US by storm! Play from 2-7 players as you become a woodman (or woman) trying to take down some bark (+1 point each) without knocking off the center pieces (-5 points each). You get 2 chops with the axe each turn and the game continues until all the bark is gone!

Note: Mayday Games English 2nd Edition. Add Golden Axe expansion for $5, or Golden Core and Bark promo for $8, or both for $10. Game in excellent condition. I will only charge the actual USPS shipping price (lowest possible) with delivery confirmation for the game. Feel free to browse through my other games for sale in the marketplace. I will provide free shipping in the continental US for orders over $150. I will also offer $10 off on shipping to anywhere else in the world for orders over $150.

Mayday Games (MYY4310) From the same folks that brought you Tok Tok Woodman, comes Click Clack Lumberjack, a new twist on the hilarious game party game! You and your fellow Lumberjacks take turns hacking at the tree trying to strip the bark while leaving the trunk itself standing. +1 point for bark that comes off and -5 points for any center trunk segments. Highest score wins! Great for players of all ages (5-99!) and great for parties, to entertain children or as a great filler between longer games.

The game has never been played. I removed the shrinkwrap to include The Golden Axe expansion. I think that the expansion had an error in packaging. The core block and bark blocks are golden, but the axe is not golden - it is the same color as the axe in the base game. The box has some creasing - that is the way it was shipped to me. Comes from a smoke-free home.
